review_content: Blanche belga dal colore giallo paglierino molto torbido e la schiuma abbondante e persistente. Il profumo è caratterizzato da note speziate di coriandolo e scorze d’arancia. In bocca è leggermente acidula ma controbilanciata da note mielate, il finale è delicato. Il corpo è leggero e morbido.
Flaska från SB. Dimmig, gyllengul kulör med vit skumkrona. Doft och smak av vetemalt, apelsinzest, koriander och jäst. Söt och fruktig.

Colore biondo pallido opaco, schiuma bianca e persistente. Aroma speziato (coriandolo) e fruttato (scorze d'arancio al curacao). In bocca è fresca e acidula, con una deliziosa nota dolce di miele; finale lungo con una leggera punta acida di limone

Una cerveza de trigo sazonada con cilantro y ralladura de naranja. Muy buen cuerpo, sabor muy fuerte y agradable. Turbia, como corresponde a las cervezas blancas. Hermosa, firme y duradera espuma. El sabor sorprende por sus complementos, pero es muy bueno. Buen grado de amargura y graduación alcohólica baja: 4.9%.

Can, pours pale gold with a light haze, a white foam and a spicy yeasty nose with hints of citrus. Sweet, slightly lemony and a little thick bodied, with more yeasty coriander notes, a touch of banana and a light crisp bitterness.
My go-to summer wheat beer! I love the orange peel and coriander aroma and taste. Hazy with a perfect amount of hops. Great for a lake side beer.

[Tasting - Beder]

Aroma: Wheat, mild koriander, hops and banana

Appearance: Hazy yellow with a huuuuge fast disspearing white head

Taste: Mildly sweet and bitter, wheat, mild koriander, hops and banana

Mouthfeel: Mouthfeel is smooth watery with moderate carbonation

Overall: Really easy drinking and smooth 😜

Hazy yellow colour with large white head. Smell of elder flowers and wheat. Taste of wheat, banana and elder flowers. Nice and classic.
Tasted at Byagervej with T, B, N.

Aroma of wheat, elderflower, banana, orange peel
Yellow colour with large lasting head
Taste is wheat, elderflower, banana, coriander. Tastes like summer
Medium carbonation with thick mouthfeel
Tasted with troels, bo and dad at troels’

Sans indication sur la bouteille, on pourrait croire que cette blanche est une mauvaise imitation industrielle d'une blanche belge par des français. Mais en fait, avec cette Hoegaarden, ce sont des belges eux même qui ont fait une mauvaise réplique industrielle. Stéréotypée, sans fougue, ni nuance, cette blanche est loin du savoir-faire de la Belgique. Le visuel est sur un blond très pale, voilé, et avec une fine couche de mousse à la surface. Avec ajout de coriandre et d'écorce d'orange, le nez manque de finesse, sur des arômes de froment, coriandre, écorce d'orange et citron. Nous sommes sur du grossier. A la dégustation, on est toutefois surpris de découvrir une intensité aromatique médiocre, avec notamment une acidité présente sur une bonne partie de la dégustation, notamment sur l'attaque qui est fraiche mais peu aromatique. Cela se poursuit en seconde bouche, qui est moins sur l'acidité, et donc avec un sucre ressortant davantage, mais sans grosse densité aromatique. On retrouve cependant les arômes présents au nez, sans réelle complexité ou fioriture. L'arrière bouche reprend l'attaque, avec une acidité plus présente et relativement insipide. Le final est sur la douceur, les céréales, mais sans entrain. Déception.

Pomarańczowe, mętne, a piana gigant. Wzorcowa. Biała, drobna, stabilna. Szkoda tylko że tak wolno opada, bo tłumi aromat. A co tam można wynuchać? Cytrus, banan, guma balonowa, ździebko siarki, przyprawy – jak to u witka. 
Lekki kwasek, sporo gazu. Pszeniczność, orzeźwienie. Trochę cytrusa, jakby biały pieprz. Czuć że piwo nie jest pierwszej świeżości (dwa miechy z haczykiem do terminu) ale nie odrzuca. Ikona stylu na świeżo dostała by na pewno więcej.

Pale murky yellow body,with big white head and medium retention. In aroma coriander noticable present,banana also. No orange? Low to medium body, high lively carbonation. Bit thin,watery. Refreshing,but not satisfied.

Aromat: pomarańcza, nuty mineralne, brzoskwinie, banan, kolendra, zboże, biały pieprz.
Smak półsłodki, estrowo-słodowy, nuty skórki pomarańczowej wybijają się na pierwszy plan, są też akcenty drożdżowe, fajnie, że kwaśność jest taka nienachalna.
Pełnia średniowysoka, goryczka niska, nagazowanie niskie.
Bardzo dobry witbier.

Hoegaarden Witbier

Pale yellow into the tulip glass. Lively but a soft dense effervescence bubbly to quick 2 inch head which rapidly fades. Cloudy in appearance more than pretty colors.  Lacing almost non existent. Can smell and taste the sweet notes of wheat. Almost void of any bitterness so absent hop contributions. 

Pleasing taste on the palette, definitely different with a witbier. Could easily down another bottle, especially because of the lower alcohol in the brew. 

No aftertastes to warrant a halt in likely choosing this beer again

Look: Pours cloudy honey yellow with a small quick gone white head. Nose: Honey, dusty flowery, faint banana. Taste: Fresh, faint ripe banana, faint green banana, not much bitterness. Overall: A nice drinkable wheat for outside sunny weather. Not an explosion of taste though.

When I first came into contact with imported beer, Fujia was the first one. The original Fujia liked it at that time. Even after I came into contact with craft beer, I would drink two cups of it occasionally at parties. However, the Korean version of Fujia, after the acquisition of Budweiser, the taste of the product is not very satisfactory. Before buying the full range of Fujia, fruit flavor and bottled version of Budweiser Fujia from Belgium. The castrated version of the Belgian Fuja is slightly less fruity and malty than the Belgian version, with extra acidity. It belongs to the same series as the acquired Padres, but I still want to drink the original version, which is not a little bit stronger. Maybe the price is advantageous. The party drink or German beer acceptability is high.

First tasted this many years ago on draught in a pub in Greenwich. I really didn't like it then but as I've matured my taste has changed too. This sampling was from a 330ml bottle. I did like the orange peel aroma and taste but it didn't last. It lacked a bit of body but was quite enjoyable.

Canette.
Robe dorée, voilée, peu scintillante, effervescence minimale.
Fine mousse blanche homogène. Tenue de mousse éphémère.
Arômes: linéaire, orange, coriandre, épices, blé.
Saveurs: équilibré avec des notes similaires aux arômes jumelées à des sucres résiduels et une fine amertume en finale.
Texture: corps mince-moyen, carbonation faible, bonne buvabilité.

Domestic Fujia is the light of white beer, affordable and easy to accept. The smell of wheat is clear and the foam is thick. The taste is very cool, and then slowly sour and sweet. After all, the price is there, which is regarded as the pass line of Belgian wheat white beer. It is worse than white bear wheat

330ml. bottle. Tasted several times during my trips to Belgium.
[#3.855 Global - #134 Belgium - #2 Brouwerij Hoegaarden]
Hazy lemon colour with a small white head. Poor retention, soft lacing. Aroma: Spiced malts, yeast and orange peel. Taste: Coriander, spiced malts, lemon peel and cardamom. Refreshing and easy to drink.
Next one please!
Pale gold bodied, medium malt sweetness The bubbles were rich and persistent Easy drinking
There is a faint scent, the mouth is very soft and light, suitable for free-flowing drinks.  Essential for getting started.
A decent witbier that is a good stepping stone into the world of Belgian beers. A refreshing beer to have at a backyard bbq.
Bottle at home.  A straight down the line white beer.  Actually it was very drinkable with plenty of flavour.  Pretty good stuff.

Bottle from local Home Bargains store – cheap 79p !  Used to drink this a lot 20-25 years ago before in fell into the clutches of Inbev.  Remember last tie I drank it (2014 my records say) being very disappointed.

Anyway, it has an aroma of lemon peel with some spicy notes.  Pours a cloudy pale lemon yellow with a small white head.  Citrus dominates in the mouth, but not in a hoppy sense.  Lemon peel, orange rind, coriander and other spices with a yeasty texture.  Not much of a finish.  A classic beer that has been dumbed down.
This is one of my top session beers. Got in a can this time, which is hard to find. But historically much better in a bottle.

0.5can From a local store. 

Pours apple juice color with a thick long lasting white head. Juicy, sweet smell. Sweet sugary beer taste with strong notes of orange and coriander. Feels like juice even with 4.9% of alcohol. I'm unfamiliar with this type of beer but i like this one.

Neobična vrsta piva, lepo, ali samo za probu. Po boji, mirisu i ukusu podseća na Sokić.

Trübe gelbe Farbe mit weißer Schaumkrone. Hefiger, fruchtiger Geruch. Geschmacklich hefig, fruchtig mit Koriander und Citrus, leicht getreidig. Mittlere Süße mit mittlerer Bitterkeit, mittlerer Körper mit spürbarer Kohlensäure.
Great flavoring here, with a great appearance as well. Best when poured into a pint glass. Smooth flavoring that has a great aftertaste. I can see people who don’t like beer even liking this one.

Highly satisfying if simple beer. This is what people *think* they're drinking when they have Blue Moon. 

Aroma was sharp, bright citrus (mostly lemon). Appearance was fun and attractive with a cloudy yellow body (looks just like home-made lemonade) and about 2 inches of thick white foam with a hard pour. 

Taste is simple but highly refreshing. Lots of citrus: lemon and orange rind.

Palate is light with no bitterness. Perfect on a hot day or while doing physical work.

Happy to return to this one.

Wygląd: Barwa jasnożółta, całkowicie zamglona. Piana biała, wysoka, zbudowana z różnych oczek, opada do małego pierścienia, nie pozostawiając lacingu. 
Aromat: Niezbyt lotny. Na pierwszym planie kolendra, niestety z szynkowymi nutami, fenolowe goździki oraz drożdże na średnim poziomie. Dalej średnioniskie cytrusy, skórka pomarańczy oraz niska słodowość chlebowa, pszeniczna. 
Smak: Płytszy, ze składowymi z aromatu. Pojawiają się również nuty bananowe. W ustach wytrawne, treściwość niska, wodnista, wysycenie średnioniskie. Goryczki brak. Finisz wytrawny z lekkimi nutami kolendry, pomarańczy i cytryny.

Blond pale trouble , fine mousse blanche abondante et tenace. arôme : citron, agrume, fuité, herbe, coriandre. pétillance moindre en bouche. Moyenne amertume. Saveur très sucrée qui couvre tout en final.
Hazy pale yellow colour with a white head. Aroma of wheat, citrus and yeast. Typical, easy to drink white ale.
Another outstanding mainstream belgian beer, alongside Leffe. Easy drinking wheat beer that's clearly been focus group tested. Reliable and goes well with an orange peel
Klasyczny Witbier, piękny zapach pomarańczy. W smaku głębokie, zdecydowanie się nie nudzi.

zapach przyjemny, intensywny, klasyczny, dość słodki, słody, jasny biszkopt, skórka z pomarańczy, kolendra, odrobina mąki i drożdży. kolor jasnego złota, lekko, równomiernie zmętniony. piana biała, dość obfita, stara się być trwała, pęcherzyki duże i średnie. w smaku pełne, bogate, jasne słody, mąka, drożdże (wszystko pozytywne), kandyzowana skórka pomarańczy, kolendra, wszystko jak powinno być. goryczka niska, lekko drożdżowa i odrobinę przyprawowa. nasycenie wysokie.
Zapach: mnostwo goździka, w tle banan i nieco pomaranczy - świeżo i stylowo. Smak sredniointensywny, gozdziki, banany do tego spora slodowa podbudowa, nasycenie srednie.
Una cerveza muy popular, con notas a plátano, jugos y cáscaras de cítricos, inesperadamente con notas a especias (específicamente cilantro). Es salada, sin embargo llega a ser refrescante.
Klasyczne, bananowe, gęste, z wyraźnym nasyceniem. Bardzo smaczne w stylu. Mega pijalne.
Bardzo dobre, rześkie, trochę cytrynowe. Troche puste w posmaku niestety ale chociaż mamy tutaj śliczny kolorek, trochę przypominający jakiegoś pszeniczniaka. Piana okej.
Bouteille 25cl couleur blanche mousse blanche goût sur la céréale, farineuse, banane agrumes, rafraîchissante
Grumset, meget lys og rigeligt, lyst og meget fint skum. Duft af jord og frugt. Fin smag af frugt og kort eftersmag. Fin fylde, der hurtigt fader ud til en let eftersmag.

Blanche Belga. Aroma estupendo. Gusto suave equilibrado algo dulce, coriandro, citrico, especies, platano, vainilla, ligero lupulo. Retrogusto refrescante y especiado muy agradable. Una de las mejores blanche que he probado.
Great wheat beer, just a standard beer, a little sweet, not too much flavor, a hint of orange maybe

Aroma is coriander, cloves, orange, yeast.
Flavour is wheat, spices, orange, mineral with light body.

color: amarillo palido, turbia, espuma blanca abundante y persistente
olor: trigo, cilantro, citrico
sabor: platano, cilantro, amargor inexistente. muy suave y poca carbonatacion.

cerveza correcta sin nada que destacar.
I've been drinking this beer for a long time, so I'm just taking this here to keep it written

With my dear Father.
Hazy yellow body, thin light yellow head.
Citrus, coriander, orange, yeasty banana.
Little bit fizzy, but fairly drinkable.
Light mouthfeel.
General choice for a witbier.

750ml bottle and my first Belgian Witbeir, well it had to be Hoegaarden didn't it!. Cloudy pale yellow with big foamy head that leaves a good retention. Aroma of yeasty banana, coriander and spice. Taste of wheat, fruity zest, mild spice and a decent malt base to hold it together. Lightish body but refreshing. I vaguely remember having this 10 years ago and finding it with too much flavour as a lager drinker. How times change! Very nice indeed.

I've got the "coriander tastes like soap" curse, but somehow I bruteforced myself into appreciating it in a good wheat beer. This one is fairly easy to find, so it's my go-to when I'm in the mood for this style. I imagine that I could do better if I tried, but I'm not bothered. It's about what you'd expect; cloudy, coriander and citrus peel up front, you get the idea. It's nice on a hot day.

Adding in my 300 Beers To Try ticks because I want to see how they impact my stats and some of them I will never see again. Will however re-rate them when practical.  Used to be a favourite when you could get it around here in pubs which is no longer the case.

Cloudy pale golden. White head.
Aroma: Malt: Straw, hay, bread. But also a pronounced hoppy element: Citrus, lemon, lime. As well as some esters.
Mouth: Moderately sweet but a balanced acidity produces a pleasant fruity freshness. Light/medium body, medium carbonation.
Bicchiere della media pesantissimo, retrogusto ittico, beverina, fresca, estiva, ottima coi formaggi
Orange sour, malt.  Something between complex and boring. Good to be an everyday drink!

Pours cloudy orange/ lemon with a large white head. Aroma is banana, coriander, clove and citrus peal. Light, refreshing, citrus acidity and sweet. Taste is coriander, banana, orange peel and some candied sugar. Slight bitterness on the finish. Pretty tasty witbier without being anything special.
Aroma 7. Appearance 3. Taste 7. Palate 3. Overall 13. Coriander and banana aroma. Wheat, spices with mainly coriander, lemon and orange taste.
Excellent 'witbier' (wheat beer) with a real summer taste. Citric accents and subtle spiciness. Nicely balanced sweet and sour flavours. Creamy finish.

33 cl bottle (BBD 2020-12-07, bought from Costcutter, drunk at home 2020-05-08.

Appearance is a hazy deep gold with a moderate thickness white head. Very little visible carbonation. Looks like a witbier, but I like a bit more colour and more head would be appreciated.

Aroma is okay. There's notes of pepper and spice up front and beneath that a hint of sweet citrus. Some herbal notes as well, although I'm not convinced I'm getting coriander anywhere. A bit muddled.

Taste is also only okay. A watery sweetness a little reminiscent of sweetcorn, some pepperiness, some non-descript fruitiness or floralness. Nothing stands out.

Palate is fine. Medium bodied, bit of in-mouth carbonation. Round, if a little thin.

Overall, this is a completely passable wheat beer, but it does nothing interesting or exciting. Nondescript and a touch muddled throughout, but it's pleasant and inoffensive.

30 cl bottle served in a snifter. Aroma: vanilla, banana, coriander, wheat, caramel, orange peel, citrus, grass. Taste: overripe banana, caramel, coriander, vanilla, orange peel, citrus, rosemary, thyme. Light to medium body with spicy bittersweet finish. Nice belgian witbier for when you fire up your bbq...

Hazy light yellow colour with a large long lasting white fluffy head.
Virtually no lacing.
Aroma of coriander, yeast and citrus.
Taste of coriander predominates, while there is a slight yeasty aftertaste. 
Slightly sweet. No alcohol taste whatsoever.
Light mouthfeel and an aftertaste that follows is slightly hoppy with a hint of bitterness.

Słomkowej barwy, zamglone.
Piana biała, drobna i trwała.
W aromacie nuty przyprawowe, kolendra, trochę cytrusów.
W smaku lekkie, orzeźwiające, przyprawowe. Bardzo pijalne.
浅稻草色，酒体多云。泡沫细，消失快。入口碳酸感基本没有，直饮非常爽快。酿造时加了香菜和橙皮。味道清淡，让人忍不住一口接着一口。好评！适合辛辣食物或一些酱类食物。

Lite citrusy aroma.
Citrusy taste.
Creamy long-lasting foam
Creamy mouthfeel

Light golden, hazy, white beerhead, with frothy and creamy foam. OK retention. Beautiful coriander and banana aroma, slight citrusy, orange and sweet hints. Light phenolics, wheat malt and light yeast flavor. Light sweetness, soft carbonation, low bitterness, and smooth touch. Crispy and dry in finish. High drinkability and enjoyable.

Aromat: Umiarkowanie wysoki aromat zbożowy wpadający w biszkopt i tuż za nim aromat cytrynowy na średnim-średnioniskim poziomie
Wygląd: Piana biała, obfita, gęsta, długo utrzymująca się. Piwo zamglone, złote
Smak: Przeważa smak cytrynowy na średnim poziomie (wpadjący w pomarańczę), a za nim średnio niski smak zbożowy/ciasteczkowy pszenicy. Lekka kwaśność.
Odczucie w ustach pełnia niska do średnioniskiej, wysycenie odczuwalne średnioniskie
Goryczka: Na niskim poziomie, delikatna, krótko utrzymująca się
Smooth witbeer.taste like bubbles swimming in the mouth.a little bit of hops.

Тем, кто любит пивные напитки, с содержанием не только солода и хмеля, но и фруктовых ингредиентов и приправ - стоит попробовать этот белый бельгийский эль с нотками кориандра и цитруса. Нефильтрованное, приятно пьется.

Short Description: Gentle herbal beer with a strong taste primarily of wheat and coriander, and secondarily of barley and orange. A little watery, very bready. Very low sourness and bitterness, barely noticeable. Easy to drink and very refreshing. .::. This beer pours beautifully into a very cloudy, light golden centre with greener accents at the edges. It's so cloudy you cannot see through the beer. The head is surprisingly large and with great retention. The aroma is strongly herbal at the edges, with a body of orange bread and pale ales. Smells more herbal than fruity. The taste is very soft, gentle wheat first, barley second, with very noticeable coriander. It has a delicate balance, I wouldn't call it sweet nor dry. Light, and definitely very herbal. A little watery, very bready. As it goes through the mouth, there is a proeminent orange bread flavour, but absolutely none of the usual citric bitterness or sourness. The orange taste is, however, not overpowering. It is very well blended among the main flavours of grains and coriander. The aftertaste is strongly herbal, heavy coriander, with a background of hops and orange, only a tiny bit of sourness, and very watery. Almost as if you had drank a delicious cold tea.

Bottle pour from BevMax, Hamden. Appearance is hazy yellow with light sparkle, finger-plus width white foamy head with decent retention and light lacing. Aroma is wheat, fruity esters, mild banana, orange, coriander. Taste follows aroma with orange higher in the mix. Mouthfeel is light side of light-to-medium bodied with smooth texture, average, frothy carbonation and finish as taste. Overall, a good representative of the style with decent complexity.

Again a beer that exists so long, that I never rated. Slight hazy light-yellow pour with foamy white head; rather good retention. Aroma is not so strong, but typical wheat beer: mild wheat malts, bit citric, soft spicy. Taste is better and less sweet than expected, refeshing, indeed spicy. Maybe this is a standard for Belgian wheat beer.
Piana wysoka, drobno pęcherzykowata, biała, długo utrzymująca się. Barwa słomkowa zamglona. W aromacie kolendra. W smaku delikatny pomarańcz, średnie nasycenie, goryczka niska. Długi finisz.
Pours hazy yellow with a thick white head. Aroma of coriander and wheat. Taste has citrus, coriander, little bit of spice. Palate has coriander on the nose, bold citrus. Very good.
Cerveja coloração opaca, quase branca. Aroma adocicado, frutado. Sabor leve, cítrico presente. Cerveja saborosa e refrescante
Narancsos koriander érződik rajta. Nagyon kellemes hatással bír. Hú de jó 👍.

How: bottle. Fridge cold.
Head: white, two finger. Fluffy.
Colour: pale, hazy.
Aroma: citrus fruits, some spicyness.
Taste: thin body, lively carbonation, spicy, citrus fruits. Some tartness.  Short to medium long aftertaste that follows aroma. 
Refreshing.
Hazy yellow color, white head. Citrus, coriander, fruity aroma and flavor. Medium sweet, citrus palate, light body.
Jasnopomarańczowe, mętne, piana niezła, trochę lacingu. W aromacie pszenica, guma balonowa, skórka pomarańczy, ogólnie cytrusy, kolendra, goździk. W smaku słodkie i kwaskowe.
Pite jakiś czas temu, stąd brak szczegółów tylko ocena przeniesiona z notatek...

I really love this beer. It’s refreshing, light and provides a unique aroma and taste. Some people don’t like coriander (cilantro), but I think the combination of wheat, orange peels and the herb makes this beer one of a kind. Serve with a slice or orange.
750ml bottle. Very nice wit beer. Cloudy and crisp. Quite carbonated but pours nicely. Lovely with a piece of orange. Highly recommend

lepa citrusna slatka aroma. 
maglovito i mutno.
okos je solidan, osjeća se korijander, mada ne toliko i pomorandža.
lep osjećaj u ustima, no malo vodenasto.

аромат на малц и слабо цитрус, пяната не е висока, но остава на тънък филм дълго време. вкусът е леко пикантен от кориандъра, воднист, сладникав, леко пшеничен. това трябва е еталон за белгийска пшенична, но не съм възхитен от нея нещо.
Cloudy pale yellow pour. Wheaty, but overall very very citrus/zesty tones. Refreshing but a bit boring
0,33lt bottle ATHENS - cloudy yellow with a white head - Aromas of fruits, herbs - tasted the previous acidic taste at first the sweet bitter
Απίστευτη μπύρα, γεύσεις διάφορες σκάνε στο στόμα σου όπως λουλούδια, καραμέλες,κτλ.συνοδεύται με μια φέτα λεμόνι
# 311; 5/2016. Osvěžující pšeničné pivo s výraznou citronovou až limetkovou chutí.
660ml bottle in 2016. Opaque ochre with a dense white head. Aroma of straw, wheat, banana, cloves and bready yeast. Soft palate. Still a good example of the style, even if it’s an emissary of InBev.
Colore giallo chiaro torbido, aromi e sapori di banana, limone e spezie. Bollicina fine e con ottima persistenza. Quasi assente l'amaro. Leggera in bocca e ben equilibrata. Birra fresca e beverina.

500 ml can poured at home.  Pours cloudy yellow without a head. Smells like old juice box (but it’s yeast). Tastes yeasty as well. It’s pretty good.  Had it several times before but first time rating.

Proper for witbier appearance: hazy golde with dense foam. Aroma is fresh banana and cloves. 
In taste also very refreshing with banana like taste and a hint of sourness.
Klasik buğday kokusu. Yanık buğday tadı. Fazlaca asitlik ama içimi fena değil. Sarı bulanıl gövde

Before i drink this beer i was pretty sure that it is a very refreshing beer and it great choice for the summer.. So i was prepare for one great blonde Belgium beer.. 
When i drink my first draught, big carboration feel my month and a punchy taste hit my brain.. That was really a great momment. After that the beer over time become less awesome and seems lose very quickly the big carboration. The taste become more and more lighter but still the beer is ok and higher from average.. 
The taste remind me "Le chouffe" and "Triplet Karmeliet" with a lot of lemon inside and general a sour taste. And that is good for me because these beers is some of my favorites.. Also this beer has little more water than usual and i don't notice some great after taste..
Overall a great and cheap beer to drink in the summer.. Is far away from the usual and ordinary beers out there. Is like "Netherlands" has "Heineken" as cheap and casual beer and "Belgium" has "Hoegaarden".. And the difference in these two beers are massive.. I take the "Belgium" casual way for sure..

Drinking Temperatures: 4-5 °C
Beer tastes like hotdog water,I don’t throw full bottles of beer away till now

750ml bottle brewed in Belgium at 4.9%. Cloudy lemony colour. Medium-small head, dissipating quickly. Faint fruit-juice style aroma, perhaps slight herbal notes - an Innocent smoothie writ small. Moderate carbonation, even when chilled as recommended. Mild orange peel and coriander flavours decorate a pleasant and gentle wheat beer, the mild sweet fruity and malty flavours in complete harmony, with an ever-so-slight apple sourness going alongside. This is the ultimate refresher, perfect beer-garden fare. A 750ml bottle disappears dangerously quickly!
Mikołaj Rutkowski is drinking a Hoegaarden Wit / Blanche by Brouwerij Hoegaarden
Average witbier color (hazy yellow), modest, humble foam. Coriander aroma is the strongest. Mild wheat, coriander taste, a little bit watery but balanced beer.
Light yellow cloudy pours, done correctly per instructions gives good but not excessive white head. Crisp citrus and coriander flavors, delicious with rich foods or on its own.

One of the truest Belgian beer tastes I've encountered. Its a crisp citrusy and spice on the front pallet followed by a smooth wheat body. It is also a cloudy Belgian with a low to average alcohol content at 4.9%, so not ideal for a night out if you have work in the morning. Overall,  truly delightful beer for the flavor and worth a try (especially during the summer months)
Birra wit con splendido aroma e sapore di zagara di arancia e coriandolo.. Super beverina e rinfrescante. In estate è il top!

Family Market 26.8 lei - 0.33 l
Aroma de coriandru, grâu, citrice. Gust de banana, coriandru, miere. Ceva specific şi original.

Piwo słomkowe, z białą pianą. W aromacie kolędra, cytrusy, może troche goździka. W smaku lekko kwaskowe, cytrusy, kolędra, pieprz może troche goździk. Na finiszu lekko bananowo - drozdzowy posmak. Goryczka dość wysoka i przyjemna.
This beer is perfect for eating dinner and possibly lunch if it’s not too hot, it’s a great tasting beer and a great amount of head! Definitely give it a try!

Hazy pale straw coloured with quite a large white, slightly rocky head. Prominent citrus, orange peel on the nose with spicy edge, coriander. Flavour has an impression of candy sweets, coriander, slight orange peel bitterness. Finishes dry with a lingering citrus note. Effervescent carbonation. Has a bit of a mass produced feel to it, but nonetheless the flavours are classic for the style. A very refreshing beer.

330ml can from Waitrose Westfield London. Best before 06/01/20. Purchased for £1.80. Served fridge cold in a weizen glass. 

Pours a very very weak straw colour. Not quite what I’d consider white. Huge head compact in the surface with larger unstable looking bubbles underneath as observed through the side of the glass. Cloudy as they come so carbonation level difficult to judge by eye. 

Aroma is very typical of the Witbier style. Heavy spice from the coriander, medium bitter from the orange peel and wheat. Smells refreshing and drinkable, especially in hot weather.

The taste follows the aroma. Not the most complex of beers but very well made for the style and good balance. 

Fairly low carbonation in the mouth without feeling flat. Both sweet and sour hits sticking around, mainly coriander. Tasty stuff.

This would be easy to knock as it is the big commercial player in the style, and a stable of AB InBev. However, it’s well made, well balanced, extremely refreshing and nicely spiced. Not the most complex but far better than many craft examples in the style. A thumbs up.

Barwa - bardzo jasny żółty, zmętnione, piana średnio obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa.
W aromacie dużo kolendry, nieco zboża, pszenicy, drożdży, odrobina pomarańczy, odrobina brzoskwini.
W smaku kwaskowe, pszenica, skórka pomarańczy, sporo kolendry, nieco przyprawowych fenoli, nieco moreli, nieco woda gazowana. 
Bardzo lekkie, niemal wodniste. Wysycenie średnie do niskiego (jak na styl). Goryczki brak.

0,75l bottle. Pours hazy pale golden with white head. Aroma of coriander, orange peel, wheat, banana, slightly fruity. Taste is fresh, coriander, orange peel, banana and wheat. Fantastic in the summer heat. Good stuff.

What we have here is a good Witbier, probably the best commercial Witbier you can get. Many craft breweries will provide better alternatives however, as this sits on the line between an original authentic recipe and a Witbier produced to please the masses with a more generic taste. It has the basic flavours of citrus, yeast, coriander and orange to make it an enjoyable alternative beer which can be enjoyed any season. I would definitely recommend having with a slice of lemon as it brings forward the flavours. Yeah, it’s a good beer!

Read the full review here:

www.beerwithus1.wordpress.com/2019/06/27/hoegaarden-white

Gran birra bianca belga, morbida, non troppo alcolica, fresca per l'estate, ma va bene tutto l'anno. Giallo paglierino abbastanza torbido. Buona schiuma che svanisce subito e non rimane più nulla. Sapore leggero, poco amara, va giù bene.

Wygląd: jasne, mętne, drobnopęcherzykowa pianka

Aromat: kolendra, zboże

Smak: wysoko wysycone, wytrawne, nuty banana, brzoskwini, kolendra

Ocena: lekkie, orzeźwiające, jak na koncerniaka bardzo przyzwoite
Muy recomendada. De sabor fuerte pero no amargo, de muy buen sabor. Si fueron muy útiles las recomendaciones es tomarla bastante fría como 2°C. Fue bebida directo de la botella.

Whitish troubled appearance, compact head. Smell of wheat, orange and coriander, refreshing and nourishing taste of wheat. The Belgian white beer par excellence. Extremely refreshing, the perfect summer beer.

A: Cloudy gold with a medium white head 
N: Spicy and brothy
T: Brothy spice and a crisp orange hit.
P: Medium-thin
O: Still the standard bearer for witbiers.
Barwa zolta zmetniona. Piana obfita drobne pecherze. aromat kolendry. smak pszenica kolendra cytrusy. Wysyceni ok goryczka niska
Δροσιστικη και τέλειος συνδυασμός με κοτόπουλο και σαλάτες. Προσθέστε δύο φέτες λεμόνι στο ποτήρι για να απογείωθει η έκρηξη κιτρου από την πρώτη κιόλας γουλιά! Μια καλοκαίρινη σούπερ επιλογή!

Słomkowe z bardzo ładną, obfita i utrzymującą się pianą. Aromat goździki, kolendra, banan. Wyrazisty i przyjemny.  W smaku podobnie. Naprawdę solidna pszenica w starym, dobrym stylu bez udziwnień. Ja to kupuje.

A great sophisticated Belgian Wheat beer for any season during the year. Not meant for chugging or "beer drinking games". The bottle does come with directions for how to properly enjoy this beer by pouring it into a glass and leaving the last 5th of it to swirl and pour for great head. Been a fan since 2010.

Hoegaarden er en rigtig standard hvedeøl fra belgien, en såkaldt blanche.

Den hælder gul hazy med et livligt og dansende hoved. Flot bombastisk flaske, der er meget genkendelig

Aroma er den belgiske hvede, appelsinskal og koriander, med en bananyeast der kunne være mere gennemtrængende

Det er en let syrlig og sød smag, der til tider blev lidt for umami

Full body, sticky feel, medium carbonation og en lang sød klistret eftersmag

Bottle in tulip. 

Aroma: immediately, I smell the citrusy, lemon-y scent. Then, I smelled the clove and spice in the body, followed by the wheat smell. A kick of sourness hits the nose, like sour dough bread. 

Appearance: hazy, yellow lemon colored body. Thin, white head with some lacing. 

Flavor: Citrus kick, low bitterness, some spice (clove). Very light bitterness in the aftertaste. Lingering wheat-y flavor. 

Mouthfeel: very well carbonated. Light body with creamy texture if swirled in mouth. 

Overall: standard witbier for everyone.
Se ami le birre bianche almeno una volta nella vita devi provarla. Bianca, torbida, schiuma fine e abbondante che si dissolve velocemente, aroma di agrumi, dolce e dissetante.
Mycket uppfriskande veteöl av belgisk bier blanche snitt. Trevlig en varm dag
ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, w celu uzupełnienia profilu

Aroma: from bottle its a mainly coriander aroma, with add of orange and malty aromas. From glass its more fresh, and citrus, smells like lemon fanta or lemonade. After few minutes, there comes some wheat flavours.
Appearance: Pale orange coloured beer, with massive white foam. There is a little -, for this foam. It should be more smooth and creamy. 
Taste: Its a little bit sour, but afterthat it seems to be very balanced. Low bitterness, but its normal in witbier. At the finish there is some sign of orange peel, and corainder. In the middle maybe some sights of sweetness. Very nice balanced.
Mouthfeel: High carbonation, light but not waterly body. Very fresh, and refreshing beer.  

Overall: Very nice, smooth and refreshing beer. Perfect for incoming summer, but not only. Price is also a big + for this beer. I will buy it again, im sure. And I think it was a good choice to celebrate Chelsea's win in the Europe League with this beer.

From bottle:
Head was glossy and thick - 
The aroma was thick with banana and light citrus notes. On the pallet the hint of banana became strong and beautifully well rounded - one of my favourites from a bottle
Pallida, schiuma fine e non molto persistente. Corpo non molto complesso, profumi di agrumi e qualcosa di spezie. Buona blanche
Buğday maltı, Arpa maltı ve meyve bahçesindeyiz dostlar kesinlikle içimi güzel bir bira.

Straw-colored, cloudy, small foam.
Nose. coriander citruses. A little malt.
Taste Malt, notes of citrus coriander, slight sweetness. Well balanced.

Bevuta alla spina e in bottiglia. 
Birra dal colore molto chiaro e dall'aspetto torbido. Schiuma abbastanza persistente e carbonazione media.
Aromi di agrumi e banana,dolce e molto dissetante.
Una delle migliori blanche.
Ótima witbier belga. Amarelo claro e turvo, quase brilhante. Aroma refrescante e cítrico. Sabor suave de coentro, na medida. Uma cerveja para toda hora.

Bière légèrement trouble typique des witbier. Au nez odeur de coriandre / orange. Houblon peu odorant.
Amertume très peu présente. Bière assez rafraîchissante aux goûts tirant vers le clou de girofle et l'orange amère. Elle joue bien son rôle de bière blanche, rafraîchissante et légère. Mais manque un petit quelque chose.
Surprisingly good, bit of citrus aroma and just an excellent flavour. Feels great on the palette and leaves a great aftertaste. Easy good summer drink.

Pours a hazy orange with white head, aroma is spicy and citric with hints of wheat, sweet and spicy taste, medium body. Can't go wrong with hoegaarden if your area doesn't have specialty brews available.

330ml bottle

(Draught) Served in Hoegaarden witbier glass. Hazy, frothy light yellow. All the classic wit flavours (wheat sourness, spice, malt). I still think if this as a ladies' drop ( even if I quite enjoyed it).
Utseende uklar lys gul med hvitt skum. Aroma og smak banan sitrus hvetemalt. Middels fyldig frisk. Smakt Januar 13

Lekkere wit biertje, sinnasappel en koriander zitten erin, wat zoet en gewoontjes, geen wonderbier maar wel een dorstlesser
Bottle from Systembolaget. Nice aroma. Milky colour. Slight corriander lemon flavours. Decent and fresh

Color amarillo pálido, ligera turbidez. Un dedo de espuma con buena retención. Aroma a pan, levadura, ligero plátano y especias. Gusto a trigo, levadura, ligera naranja, limón y cilantro, un punto de acidez y muy ligera sensación picante al final del trago. Cuerpo medio/bajo. Una Birra que he bebido en cantidades industriales durante toda mi vida, que me encanta y siempre cumple, totalmente equilibrada, fresca y gustosa.
One of my favourites. Light, fruity scent, highly sparkling. Whenever I can have it on tap in put, it’s my choice.

Cerveza feutal, ligera de color muy pálido.
Bebida con poca espuma y poco cuerpo.
Acompañado con Maní

A fruit taste beer.Not much creamy like Paulaner,nice and smooth at the beginning when you drink.But when finished your drink ,it turns out some weird flavor on your mouth.That’s the reason I don’t like it too 100%,beside that everything works fine for this kind of  light beer

Tight white creamy head stayed on a hazy lemon coloured body.
Spice yeast & grass aroma.
Medium bodied, soft on the palate with a sharp tingly finish.
Floral tastes with spices, cardamom, lemon & yeast.
Very refreshing!
Aroma of clove and orange peel. Really easy drinking wit beer that pairs well with light meals

(Russian version, 0.5 bottle)
Definitive white beer. Enveloping silky texture, great aroma, nice taste.

I've had this a number of times over the years, including in my home when I started that different bottle tastings. My first tasting last night however for a number of years, I feel like it was still a good beer, but it's nothing like it used to be. Now day's there are far superior white beers made all over the world.
Tastes good with beautiful foamed golden color. I have tried this beer many times and I still feel its aroma is like a fragrant natural drink.

Thought I had reviewed this, but must have missed.  Grabbed another 6-pack because was on sale, plus I got an additional $2 off a 6-pack for buying 2....so pretty much got a 6 of Hoegaarden and a 6 of Leffe for $5.99 each.  An offer that I couldn't refuse.  Not the best Wit, but for the price figured would be my economy beer for now.  The season is right too.  Pale yellow pee-like appearance.  Aroma a tad on the skunky side.  Smooth mouthfeel with wheaty and light hop flavor.  It is what it is.
W aromacie kolendra, pszenica, cytryna. Przyjemy, średnio intensywny. Barwa pomaranczowa, metne, piana kiepska. W smaku lekkie, orzezwiajace, cytrusowe, wysoko wysycone. Fajne, codzienne piwko.
Trafiła mi się butelka z lekkim siarkowodorem (zgniłe jaja) po za tym ok pszenica lekka przyjemna czuć goździki

Tap tap en tap. Ook wel eens fles. Dit was een tijdlang een bier dat je als vanzelf dronk op terras. Lekker drinkbaar witbier, citroen erin en klaar. Opvallend is dat het nu ook weer niet meer zo'n ongelofelijk goed bier is.

Posiblemente la Witbier más famosa del mundo. Referencia de un estilo. Color amarillo pálido turbio con corona blanca abundante con buena retención. Aromas a cilantro, lima, pan, cereal sin tostar y plátano verde. Carbonatación media y cuerpo ligero que hace que el trago sea fácil y quieras repetir. Sabor a trigo y cítricos, especias y fruta ácida suave. Amargor escaso. Una cerveza deliciosa ideal para degustar en una terraza con unas aceitunitas.

12oz bottle from Trader Joe’s in Cupertino.  Light yellow color.  Maybe a little hazy.  Lasting white fine bubble foam.  Wonderful wheat wit beer yeasty aroma. Coriander and orange peel aroma is light.  Easy to drink.  Wonderful.  One of my favorite styles.
Not a fan of the smell. Very light yellow color with a very wheat filled flavor. Decent beer.

Kolor jasno złoty oczywiście mętny. Piany niedużo.
Aromaty: słód, kolendra, troszkę cytrusów
Smak i odczucia: delikatne, wodniste, lekka słodycz, nasycenie średnie w stronę wysokiego, delikatnie kwaśne, goryczka niemal niewyczuwalna.
W sumie przyjemne piwko na upalne dni.

Very light opaque yellow two tone darker on top  finger of head smell of wheat citrus light spices banana coriander malts taste fruity malts spices coriander goes down smooth and I do get that sweet and bitter taste nice

Picked up a case by accident, but now I'm glad I did. Has a pleasant unique taste that is particularly good on a hot day after work. Just a note though, I researched its history and apparently it's traditionally had with a slice of lemon. Don't do this as I found it much better without.

Un classique du paysage brassicole belge, une blanche disponible presque partout pourvue d'un nez très typique de ce type de bière mettant en avant le coté un peu épicé de la coriandre. La bouche se dirige plutôt vers la banane dans un premier temps pour laisser ensuite place à l'écorce d'orange.
It pours a cloudy yellow color and has a fruity banana aroma with a sweet taste.
Bottle from beerhawk mystery box. Cloudy appearance with thin head. Wheat aroma. Citrus and wheat flavour.
Bottle from Dirk. Slightly clouded darker yellow with firm white head.  Very light and tart - clearly within standard type.  Solid enough
A very typical wheat beer. Not too thick but significant yeasty bready citrus flavor.

Very pretty foamy head with a body almost entirely opaque, straw-yellow color. Gentle aroma of bananas and bread.
Tasting notes were a surprise. I expected to get alot of tart, citrussy tang, but its a very round flavor. It tastes like someone took all the acidity out of an orange, like a clementine or an orange sweet. A nice banana bread note is doing its own thing in the background. The finish is negligible, which isnt necessarily a bad thing. The beer is in your mouth, then its gone.

Ein ABInBev-Bier, das die Konsumenten für dumm verkauft. Das Bier schmeckt fast nach nichts  - leicht phenolig, wird in Dtl aber für ~7€/Liter verkauft. In Belgien gibt es Billig-Biere für 29 Cent, die genauso schmecken. Das gleiche Problem zeigt sich bei Leffe-Fruchtbieren, die ebens von ABInBev vertrieben werden. Das soll aber keine grundsätzlich Diskreditierung von ABInBev sein - vielleicht haben die auch gute Biere. Irgendwo.

Piwo jasnożółte, opalizujące. Piana gęsta, zbita, długotrwała, tworzą się "dołeczki" na jej wierzchu. Aromat bardzo ładny, świeży, goździki, pomarańcza, banany, lekka landrynka. W smaku banan, guma balonowa, drożdże. Bardzo lekkie, słodko-wytrawne. Świetnie się pije, godny polecenia weizen.
Нефильтрач заебись.... Правильно пить с охлаждённого бокала... Вкус открывается больше...
Cerveja de aroma doce, com sabor de notas cítricas, porém uma cerveja pesada para refrescar do calor, não dá tá tomar várias  e ficar de boa, porém possui um enorme custo x benefício

Color amarillo pálido, ligeramente turbia. Espuma blanca abundante y de escasa retención. Aroma cítrico, a trigo, pan, platano y levemente especiado. Sabor igual, ligeramente más especiado. Textura casi sedosa. Carbonatación media baja.

Muy equilibrada, suave y aterciopelada. Espectacular.
Cerveza blanca con suave aroma a lúpulo. Color turbio, con poca espuma y gusto algo ácido.

6-8 évvel ezelőtt (a hazai sörbumm előtti időkben) kifejezetten jó kis búza sörnek számított. Kedveltem. Komlex, lágy, kicsit korianderes, frankó búza sör volt. Az éves során nem csak én változtam, hanem ez a sör is. Veszített jellegéből, ma már csak halvány emléket érbreszt bennem, hogy anno mennyire jó volt ezt inni.
witsi dessa pitzinos ferri forri horristas con dolla wenza in destrosta del dosta
Sweet vanilla and orange peel and lighty smokey its rally nice and enjoy in a hot day
A Witbier mais famosa. Leve, refrescante, e com cheiro e retrogosto de laranja. Ótima drinkabilidade.

De grifo en L’Europe, probada anteriormente. Color amarillo claro con cierta opacidad, llamativa espuma blanca que se acaba desvaceciendo. Aromas frescos a trigo, cáscara de naranja y comino. En boca tiene una carbonatación media, sabor predominante de trigo con toques especiados y cítricos. Comparada con la Chimay o la Baptist es muy floja, pero está bastante buena.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

W aromacie ładnie, cytrusy, pomarańcza, goździk i trochę kolendry. Bardzo mocno nasycone, przez co jest bardzo orzeźwiające, ale przeszkadza to w odbiorze. Typowy posmak pszenicznych słodów, trochę cytrysów i lekka kwaśność. Bardzo delikatna goryczka z lekkim ziemisto kolendrowym akcentem. Ok

Bottiglia da 0,33. Colore giallo paglia schiuma abbondante ma volatile. Carbonatura appena abbondante ma adeguata. Aromi di frumento, banana e limone. Gusto lieve e non deciso finale lungo con sentori agrumati. Consiglio 7/10
Maxi Orašje. Pivo mutno sa komadima u čaši. Osjeti se i naranča i korijander. Ukusno pivo bez puno pjene
A cloudy wheat beer brewed with coriander and orange peel.  Almost no head  but good wheat beer taste
Bevuta tante volte in bottiglia ed alla spina.  Ottima blanche.  Fresca e profumata.

Old rating rerated 09.02.2015, 0,25l bottle @ home:
Nice creamy mediumlasting head. Aroma is fruity, orange, wheat, yeast, hay, coriander, grass, orange peel, peach. Taste is mild and fruity, wheat, orange, yeast, hay, coriander, orange peel, peach, minerals, grasshints of bubblegum. Medium bitterness, quenching mouthfeel. Very nice and refreshing. More or less the definition of a good wit...
Garrafa. Coloração Amarela turva.  Espuma de boa formação e média persistência. Aroma frutado cítrico e condimento. Sabor acompanha o aroma.  Boa carbonatação, levemente ácida. Alto drinkability.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Żółty, lekko posrebrzony kolor, mętny, biała czapa, opada do kożucha i nieźle się utrzymuje. W aromacie przyprawy, kolendra, pszenica, płatki zbożowe, delikatne cytrusy, dość intensywnie. W smaku pierwsze wrażenie lekko rozwodnionego piwa mija dość szybko i wychodzą ciekawe posmaki przypraw i pszenicy, smak zaokrąglony, lekkie pszenne pieczywo, finisz półwytrawny zahaczający o subtelne cytrusy. Porządny klasyczny witbier.
Orange color, big foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.
Настоящее нефильтрованный бельгиец, немного водянистый, достаточно газированный, цвет желтый светлый нефиль.

This USED to be my favourite beer. Then AB InBev bought the beer and now it tastes like corporate bullshit. Hoegaarden pours hazy, pale yellow. The frothy white head sticks around for quite some time. The notes of clove, pepper, orange, lemon, and coriander are very intense in the pretty nose, while the banana note is more muted. It is very smooth on the palate, with a dominant lemon note complemented by soapy coriander and mineral notes, however, the mid-palate doesn’t undergo a very complex transition. There is virtually no bitterness at all, hence the clean finish is completely dominated by the acidity and typical wheat-yeast-interaction. The body couldn’t be lighter in a beer with 5% ABV, while the carbonation is very lively and makes the mouthfeel pleasantly bubbly. Ridiculously refreshing.

Met 4000 recensies zijn alle smaken en aroma's al wel beschreven, denk ik. Toch nog even melden dat Hoegaarden een van de weinige bieren is waar Curaçaoschillen in zitten wat toch een aparte smaak geeft. In principe weiger ik InBev-producten te drinken, maar een recensie moet objectief zijn. Al vele keren is aan dit John Celis-bier gesleuteld (lees: commerciëler gemaakt), maar ik krijg de indruk dat InBev uiteindelijk begrepen heeft dat men best aan een voorbeeldbier niet te veel meer aankomt. Een voorbeeldbier blijft Hoegaarden: het is een toonzetter onder de witbieren. Laat ons toch nog even duidelijk zijn: er is een hemels verschil tussen een perfect getapte Hoegaarden van 't vat in een gekoeld glas, welke zalig is, en een Hoegaarden uit een flesje die niet te drinken is. Vreemd toch, zo een verschil, niet?

Hoje dia de experimentar uma cerveja de trigo leve com laranja e coentro, uma mistura que geralmente pouco me agrada, mas aqui pelo menos pareceu que a mistura foi muito bem-feita para o meu gosto, além da ótima sensação leve e refrescante. A apresentação da cerveja é simples, o rótulo bem branco, não traz quase nenhum desenho ou algo que chame a atenção, somente a marca em uma cor um pouco mais escura. No copo a cerveja é bem explícita de ser uma Witbier, um dourado claro levemente opaco e com pouca formação de espuma. O aroma é simples e fraco, mas sente-se bem algo cítrico e de trigo, mostrando que a mistura diz ter é bem presente, além da boa leveza de ser uma Witbier. O sabor é bem agradável, a principal característica continua sendo a leveza, um sabor suave de trigo, bem agradável e constante, algo que é bem típico da Witbieir e aqui se apresenta muito bem. Outra boa característica são os tons cítricos, que são bons e não atrapalham no sabor, mas em goles mais longos dão um gostinho a mais, um diferencial gostoso de se manter na boca e que forma uma combinação boa com o trigo da cerveja. Algo que quase passou em branco foi o coentro, que não se mostrou presente em quase momento nenhum, somente em goles mais alongados algo é perceptível, mas sem quase nenhuma força. No geral, uma cerveja leve e bem refrescante, que mostra sabores de trigo e cítricos bem presente, uma mistura que não tira nenhuma característica da Witbier, mostrando que até alguns ingredientes fortes podem ser bem suavizados.

W smaku odnajdujemy podobne akcenty. Trunek niezwykle orzeźwiający, gładki, pozbawiony najmniejszych śladów goryczki, czyli tak jak być powinno. Jedno z najlepszych piw pszenicznych jakie piłem.

Appearance: Pours hazy pale yellow with a white head, no lacing.
3/5

Aroma: Citrus, bananas, malt sweetness.
6/10

Taste: Coriander, orange peels and bananas, with slight bitter and refreshing finish.
5/10

Mouthfeel: Light bodied, low carbonated.
3/5

Overall
8/20

Słomkowe, zmętnione z ładną pianą. W aromacie słodki banan, kolendra, suszona pomarańcza - czyściutki aromat. W smaku lekko słodkie na początku, lekko słodowo-bananowe, wytrawny, kolendrowy finish, jest lekkie żelazo i brak charakterystycznej kwaskowości ale reszta na prawdę najwyższy level. Drobne bąbelki dają efekt musowania, nie jest wodniste... Nadal nie lubie witbierów ale ten faktycznie jest stylowy na maksa, prawie ideał :) Ocena przez wzgląd na zgodność ze stylem, preferencje odkładam na bok :)

An unenthusiastic review from “memory”, only scoring a 2.5 in my scrawlings on my copy of 1001 Beers to try before you die. No tasting notes. 


Re-rated Aug 2018, with a new approach to weiss beer (trying to train my palate as I’ve been ignoring this style mostly). Cannot argue that this is not a refreshing beer. Sweetness at a minimum, nose is boozy but with slight fruit esters. Mouthfeel is quite thin, but refreshingly so, hoppier than I remember, with a balanced (some I’m sure would instead say restrained) banana / yeast / clove profile that makes this very drinkable. Weird aftertaste of like, some kind of sugar fog left in the mouth. 750ml bottle.
A good fair amount of hay cereal dough barn banana, and choice hops. Fresh. Buy again.

Ízre nagyon kellemes könnyű 🍺. Csukott szemmel is megmondanám, hogy Hoegaarden annyira tipikus ízeket hagy maga után. Szénsav is megfelelő mennyiség van benne. Egy dolog nem tetszett az pedig hogy semmi habja nem volt, mintha valamilyen üdítő lett volna ki öntve a pohárba...

330ml bottle from the shop drunk at home. Pours cloudy with a short-lived frothy head, heavy lacing and no visible bead. Dirty pale yellowish-grey in colour. Aroma of banana, apple muddy citrus and dough. Creamy carbonation in the mouth releasing lightly spicy, floral, citrus and bread flavours. Medium bitterness keeps it fresh and a touch of sweetness adds balance. A slightly metallic aftertaste, but not enough to spoil the experience. Overall, an interesting take on the style worthy of its popularity.
If you like wheat beers then this one is a beaut. Hazy, cloudy in colour with floral notes and a clean refreshing taste

0,33 l bottle. Pours hazy light straw with a finger of frothy white dissipating head. Aroma of citrus, banana, bread, yeast and light spiciness. Taste is light sweet and light bitter. Flavor is bread, banana, coriander is more noticeable. Body is on the light side, texture slick and carbonation average. Finish is quite long, starts sweet and goes to light spicy bitterness. Nice and refreshing.

Light straw, slightly hazy, good, tall foam. Weizen-ish smell, i.e coriander, delicate bananas, fresh smell. Light, dry, the bitterness low, but detectable. Rather wheaty character. Refreshing. Not bad.
Cerveja de trigo levemente turva, não é uma das minhas favoritas da categoria. Mas tem um bom custo benefício e é muito fácil de encontrar.
Colore giallo torbido, buon sapore di frumento e lievito belga. Retrogusto piacevole, consigliata durante i pasti.
比利时小麦啤酒 较早进入国内市场 所以到处都能看到它的身影 微甜中带着微酸 不似德国白啤的正统 比利时是可以加香料的 香气独特 什么时候扳指数数 到底有多少经典经火灾后浴火重生的

Very light. Almost like drinking a cloud. The Belgian style really comes through, as each drink is slightly different. Overall would recommend. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
A good bananay Witbier. Citrus and coriander notes can both be detected. Very smooth, refreshing, quite creamy on the palate.

330mL, 24 pack, BB Oct. 2017. Drank a few months ago. 
Appearance: Cloudy yellow with a pillowy white head which quickly faded. 3
Aroma: Citrus esters, yeast. 7
Taste: Light. Refreshing orange peel and coriander. Low bitterness. Hints of Belgian yeast. 7
Mouthfeel: Light body, high carbonation (too much). 3
Overall: Light and refreshing. 14
Zbożowość, kolendra, cytrusy. Niedużo ciała. Średnio słodkie, lekkie, wysoko wysycone, trochę pustawe na finiszu.
Cerveza belga de trigo con sabores muy compensados. Tiene un toque dulce y afrutado.

Barwa słomkowa, piwo opalizujące ze średnią dość trwałą pianą. W aromacie pomarańcze, kolendra, banan, delikatna nuta mleczna i cytrynowa. W smaku pierwsze co rzuca się na kubki smakowe, to cytrusowa kwaśność, później czujemy klasyczne pomarańcze i kolendrę. Jest odrobina słodyczy jak i goryczki. Całość jest trochę przegazowana, ale ten typ (Belgowie) tak ma. Piwo jest lekko wodniste. Generalnie, bardzo fajne i orzeźwiające piwo na lato, radzę za to nie spodziewać się cudów, bo rodzimy Kormoran witbier jest lepszy.
Piwo wypite przed zalozeniem konta na RateBeer. Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnien z degustacji.

330 ml bottle. Cloudy pale yellow colour, big head with good durability, nearly no lacing, lively carbonation. Nose is fruity, ananas, banana. Flavour is medium sweet, low bitterness, orange, coriander. Rather watery with a short finish. Nice but not outstanding.

Bottle from Wellcome superstore Wuxing road, Taipei. I don't need to overly explain this one. Clean, bright and fruity. It is such an enjoyable and iconic beer. Fruity and fresh but not overly. The one slight negative could be it does have a slight sacharin-esque edge to it but it's a minor, niggly complaint. Great in the summer and in the winter. It is a classic.

From Sep 2007

Pours from 330ml bottle(best by 20/09/08) a slightly hazy straw colour with a fairly large head of foam that recedes quickly to just some spotting and some lacing.

The smell is of wheat, banana, and clove.

The taste is some nice wheat flavour, very light clove, and even lighter banana. Very lightly flavoured over all but what is there is good. Just needs to be a bit more assertive. The mouthfeel is light, the carbo is light, and it finishes on the watery side.

Bottom line: It's been a while since I last had some of this and I don't recall it being *this* light on the flavours. In my book, it's just so so. There are lots of others in the style that please my palate more.

My first encounter with a white one, many, many years ago. Steady hot day gusher.  Cloudy yellow pour with a quick dissipating white layer. Citrus and sweet pineapple and that undeniable wet dog smell. Fresh citrus flavours and a hint of tropics. Thin mouthfeel with medium carbonation. Doesn't disappoint ever I guess.  Not one the greats but very sessionable!!

250ml bottle. Cloudy, orangey golden colour with small, frothy, half-way lasting, minimally lacing, white head. Wheaty, slightly spicy and minimally fruity aroma, hints of banana, orange. Taste is minimally sweet wheaty, slightly fruity, hints of banana, orange, a bitter and minimally tart touch of orange zest, coriander overtones. Very well balanced, paradigmatic for sure, but not outstanding.

On draft it is very obvious why this is considered a benchmark bar in its style. It is palatable to a broader range of drinkers as it is Mellower than Allagash White, without that spicy bite. It's a well presented and great tasting brew.

Tap, Stills. Cloudy yellow gold with a full, frothy white head. Wheat, grass, grain, oranges, banana, clove, a little smoke. Fizzy carbonation. Fresh, yeasty finish. Really refreshing, and a great go to since it's virtually everywhere (yes, had it with the orange slice).

Apparently I haven't rated this yet. This time had it on tap at Hong Kong International Airport, paired with local pork belly and chicken rice dish. Poured deep white-orange with some white foam on top. Nose is as always, lots of orange juice, invitingly fruity. Taste has a bit of carbonation, light and flavourful, goes down really easy. I have pretty much always liked Hoegaarden, even long before I knew about craft beer. Best on tap and from that heavy original glass!

Pale yellow colour, tiny foam. So powerful aroma: a bit floral, honey, coriander. The taste is similar to Blanche de Namur. More light, but more drinkable: orange, coriander, herbs, yeast.Light body, creamy texture and soft carbonation in finish. Nice.
Zajímavý pivní styl, pro mě však poměrně nezáživný. Jemný říz, nakyslá chuť s tóny pšenice, kyselé aroma a jemná pěna.

Botella 0,33l Color de limonada turbio con espuma blanca alta, medio fina, resistente. Aroma tipico para trigo, citrico, banana, frutas.Sabor muy suave casi sin amargor, citrico, banana,cedra de naranja, frutas. Postgusto citrico,ácido, fresco

330ml bottle. Pours hazy yellow, nice white head. Aroma is wheaty, some banana, citrussy, tart, flowery. Taste is wheaty, sourish, citrussy, lemony, coriander. Light to medium body, crisp carbo. Simple witbier, very refreshing and easy to drink.

From tap.

Very strong citrus flavour. Predominant banana aroma and flavour as well. Overall well composed, foam lasts for some time. Excellent aftertaste
Great summer beer! Light refreshing full of citrus flavors. Very well balanced with a nice refreshing finish. Enjoy!
Backlog, ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji oraz przepisana z profilu na Untappd. przeciętny witbier
Ahhh... An old old friend. Cloudy with a hint of lemon. Like a citrus induced cataract, only tastier!
A very special wheat beer. Exceptional refreshment.  A blessing on earth provided by the fine people of Belgium.

I do love Witbier and Hoegaarden is among the better. It is good and refreshing from a bottle, often served with a lemon, although I think this is not necessary for its wheaty flavors are accompanied by a fine citrus note already. Better of course from tap. And being the most widely distributed Witbier, there are even options to have it from tap as far away as Thailand.

Jasno żółte, mętne piwo z długo utrzymująca się pianą. Smak lekko kwaskowaty, wytrawny, nuty kolendry i skórki pomarańczy, dość rzeskie. Aromat mało wyrazisty trochę pszenicy, jeszcze mniej przypraw. Średniej klasy witbier

Cerveza con espuma duradera y cremosa, aromas a malta y sabores dulces con puntos a crema dulce.

33 cl. bottle @ Home.
Aroma: low to medium intense aromas of grains, wheat and some spicy, citrusy, malty overtones.
Appearance: light yellow straw color, very pale. Perfectly white foam with extremely high thickness and made of assorted sized bubbles, mainly very tiny but with some medium sized and big bubbles too. High retention. Low Brussels' lacing. Low to medium hazyness.
Taste: low to medium sweetness, low bitterness, low sourness. Flavors of citrus, wheat, grains, lime. Quite well balanced, flavor is mainly sweet with no bitterness, but it has a citrusy flavor that balances the malt sweetness and makes the beer refreshing and thirst-quenching.
Appearance: medium body, watery to oily texture almost silky, medium carbonation, quite long sweet-citrusy finish with flavors of wheat, grains, citrus, and malt overtones.
Overall: quite intense aromas and flavors of grains, wheat, some malt in the background. Not bad, but the citrus flavors are too noticeable and probably the beer would improve with less citrus flavor. The slightly acidic flavor makes this beer quite refreshing and thirst-quenching. No bananas nor bubblegum aromas or flavors. Good for summer.

On draught at Pizzeria bar in Velke Pavlovice, Czech Rep.
Pours a hazy yellow colour with a nice thick foamy white head. Served with a wedge of lime. 
Bitter citrusy aroma.
Bitter citrusy flavour, coriander seeds, bitter lemon/orange peel and all the flavours that are expected from a Belgium whit bier. Very nice refreshing beer.

Bottle. Hazy yellow with a quickly fading white head. Coriander, citrus peel, grains, fermentation. Lightly sweet, turns tart and zesty. Medium body with pearly carbonation, leaves a tingling mouth feel. Not watery, pretty solid standard wit.
aroma traz o trigo de forma pura. bastante turva, média carbonatação. bastante refrescante. nota 8,5. muito boa wit.

Buena chela. Trigo. Ligera. Espumosa. Amargura justa. Buena para acompañar alimentos.

Aromat lekko chmielowy, czuć również goździki, banany. W smaku pszenica, drożdże i wyrazista goryczka. Mimo to dość lekkie, pijalne piwo.
My favorite beer so had to rate it here! Just so good - what more is there to say?!

Bottle. Hazy pale yellow colour. Huge long-lasting white foam. Coriander and orange aroma. Malty wheat flavour, slightly sour flavour and low bitterness which make the beer refreshing. Medium-low body and medium carbonation restrain the 4.9% Abv. The queen of the witbiers.

Piwo białe, lekko mętne. Piana niewielka ale gęsta. W zapachu delikatnie bananowo-goździkowe. W smaku również delikatnie bananowo-goździkowe... Trochę wodniste - trzeba się postarać żeby wyczuć smak czy zapach. Niskonasycone, delikatne, pijalne.

Color amarillento, opaco debido a su turbidez, con capa de espuma blanca de tres dedos de grosor (buena retención). Carbonatación media. Textura acuosa y ligeramente efervescente. Aroma a cereal, plátano, pan, cítricos (peladura de naranja), especias (más contenidas que en otras Witbier; están presentes pero de manera sutil). En boca es muy frutal, con algo de acidez por parte de los cítricos, contrapunto dulce aportado por la malta. Especiada, de nuevo, pero sin pasarse. Lo justo para apreciar el cilantro y que no resulte excesivo. Final especiado. Mucha calidad para tan baja graduación.
Välimuselt pleekinud võilill. aroomis annab esimese emotsiooni pärm. Nisuõlle skaalal kuulub isiklikku esiviisikusse
zapach fajny ale strasznie słaby trzeba się skupić aby coś dotarło.  w smaku wodniste i dopiero posmak je ratuje.  Poprawne ale przereklamowane

Todo un referente en su estilo, las witbier belgas. Bastante turbia y de color amarillo claro, con una espuma blanca y jabonosa que disminuye rapidamente. En nariz se aprecian toques cítricos: de naranja sobretodo y especias como el cilantro o la pimienta. Tras darle el primer trago, deja una sensación muy agradable de querer beber más, una cerveza ligera y 100% refrescante. En su sabor se aprecia el trigo y las notas cítricas, pero las especias (en concreto el cilantro) dominan su sabor e inundan el paladar con su alta carbonatación, dándole un caracter personal a esta cerveza. Sencilla, ligera pero muy rica y refrescante, perfecta para tomarla en verano.
Piany praktycznie brak, ale w smaku i aromacie jest już nieźle. Białe owoce, trochę nawet jak białe wino, nieco akcentów belgijskich i słodowych. Trochę wodniste. W sumie trochę nudne.
Boca 0,33L - kupljena u Kauflandu...fino pitko pivo, malo se osjeti i banane u svemu...veselim se iducem susretu

Hazy yellow beer with very fine thick white head. Very intense nose of the typical coriander and citrus-orange aroma. In the mouth the wheat dominates and orange and coriander move more to the background. Smooth and refreshing and very well drinkable.

On tap, at Belgian Beer Cafe in Riga.
Hazy, light golden colour, as expected.
The nose is also as expected, with the classic citrus-coriander complex and additional sweet wheat notes (although a classic Hoegaarden glass isn’t the optimal vessel for nosing).
In the mouth it has the same medium to medium light body as the bottled version, but it has definitely more Brett (hay, leather, touch of farmyard) than the bottled version. This makes it more complex and interesting, while still being the nice, refreshing summer drink which is it’s strength.

Opaque, cloudy yellow with a quickly dissipating white head. Very pleasing to the eye! No lacing.
Sweet and sour comes through in the aroma. Lots of yeast and bread too. Coriander really comes out as the beer approaches room temperature.
Spicy and crisp at the start. Lots of coriander in the middle. With a nice tart and spicy finish.
Very highly carbonated like a sparkling wine. Could use a bit more in the body and mouthfeel but theflavors more than compensate.
Flaske. Lys gulaktig, uklar farge. Moderat karbonert med tynn skumtopp. Smaker hvete,sitrus, koriander,appelsinskall,hint av banan og kardemomme . En helt grei wit

Bought this to compare with some of the local Witbiers. Aroma of fruity/banana yeast and spices.Very pale hazy goldish-yellow, lots of bubbles, 1/2 inch thick white head that recedes to a thin cap fairly quickly. Plenty of taste to stand up to food, but not overwhelming.
